about_the_game:
DWARF LAND
Embark on a legendary journey into the heart of Dwarf Land, a realm brimming with astonishing landscapes that whisper tales of ancient grandeur and untold treasures. In this immersive 3rd person open world, you shall forge your destiny as the last of the stout dwarves, a survivor in a world shattered by thieving darkness.

Craft Your Saga:
Unearth your legacy as a resilient dwarf, your fate intertwined with the destiny of your kin. The towering mountains that once housed your ancestral riches have been ransacked, leaving naught but echoes of former splendor. It falls upon your shoulders to rekindle the fires of dwarven heritage, to restore the luster of a once-mighty civilization. For gold is the running blood of dwarves, and its gleam is the heart of your craft.

Masterful Artistry:
In Dwarf Land, the world is your anvil and the earth your forge. Shape your destiny through modular building, a symphony of creativity that lets you construct a tapestry of structures and fortifications, each unlocked by the discovery of rare materials. Unleash your inner artisan as you craft a legacy carved in stone, wood, and steel. Gold, the metal of kings, shall flow through your veins, infusing your creations with dwarven brilliance.

Survive and Thrive:
The rugged beauty of Dwarf Land is matched only by its harsh realities. Venture into dense, cluttered forests, where life's abundance teems amidst hidden dangers. Navigate treacherous swamplands pulsing with otherworldly energy, and conquer the towering peaks of the sculpted Rocky Enclaves. To flourish, you must master the art of survival against all odds, transforming adversity into triumph.

Forge and Fury:
From the molten heart of a blazing furnace to the precise clang of an anvil, master the arts of crafting in specialized workstations. Unearth the secrets of the forge, smelter, tanning rack, and more, to forge formidable weapons, exquisite armor, and potent elixirs. Your journey demands a sharp blade and a steadfast heart—prepare to hunt, toil, and tame the wilds in your quest for survival.

Monstrous Adversaries:
Darkness has not left Dwarf Land unscarred. Cunning goblins roam the caverns, while ancient crypts house spectral secrets. Roaring trolls and sinister orcs prowl in shadows cast by ominous clouds. As you navigate these treacherous landscapes, battle becomes inevitable—seize the spoils, unravel the mysteries, and rise triumphant.

Unveil Dwarven Mysteries:
Seek hidden caves and cryptic enclaves scattered across the realm. Decipher riddles, and reveal their secrets to unearth precious recipes, crafting stations, and ancient skills. Become the master of your craft, wielding the tools, weapons, and armor that once adorned the grandest of dwarven heroes. Gold, a treasure of infinite worth, awaits those who dare to uncover it.

Epic Exploration:
From lush green meadows to blizzard-swept peaks, every biome tells a tale in Dwarf Land. Traverse burnt forests, murky swamps pulsating with mystical energy, and rocky mountainscapes as you unveil the richness of this vibrant world. Adventure beckons, and discoveries await those who dare venture forth.

Craft Your Destiny:
Within Dwarf Land, the anvil's ring and the pickaxe's strike are the echoes of dwarven resilience. As the last of your kind, wield your hammer and carve your tale. Forge, fight, and flourish, and may your journey through these hallowed lands be etched in history.

The Early Access Journey:
As you shape the land and its lore, prepare for a journey filled with wonder and anticipation, an odyssey where each addition expands the realm and your experience. Dwarf Land beckons you to partake in a dwarven saga of creativity, resilience, and rediscovery. Early access marks but the beginning of your epic adventure.

Dwarf Land awaits. Your saga begins now amid landscapes of wonder, peril, and the radiant glint of gold.

  • Processor: Intel i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Embark on a journey in Dwarf Land, a procedurally generated open world. Master modular building amidst dense forests and towering peaks. Unleash creativity in crafting, hunting, and mining. Discover dwarven culture in a vibrant sandbox simulation. Dwarf Land awaits, a realm of endless possibilities.
